entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
